title: Mask Appeal
description: When Diana finds luxurious gown on the rack at Cinderella Cleaners, she knows it would be perfect for the masquerade ball in town. Too bad she's not allowed to attend the star-studded event. Â But thanks to a mask and a few friends, Diana sneaks in. Once there, she's excited to dance with her new crush - that is, until she runs into another crush from her past! Even worse, she spots some other unexpected guests who could ruin everything for her. Will Diana be unmasked before the clock strikes midnight?
author: Maya Gold
